faqs.q: How many calories in Chick-fil-A small fries?
What are the carbs in Chick-fil-A small fries?
faqs.a: 43g total carbs, including 4g fiber and 0g sugars.

faqs.a: 15g total fat, with 2g saturated and 0g trans fat.
